entry.title: Driving
entry.content:
After I get the driving license, I neally ever drive.

But there is a chance for me to drive.

The day befor I take the Toefl Test, my siste and my brother in law came to join the wedding.

Although the driver, my brother in law try to avoid dringking, but it failed. And he need to work tomorrow, and my sister too.

So the driving burden came to me, I did not the lenth from my home to my sister and brother in law’s apartment, but maybe 30 kilometers or more.

This is my first time to drive so far after I get the driving license.

Just write this article to remember this thing.

entry.title: Smartphone
entry.content:
My old android phone is broken, it can not start up. I did not know why? Because when I pluged in its battery on the night. It still could work. But when I wake up, it could not start up.

So I just found out my old Windows Mobile phone, my first smart phone with 64Mhz cpu and 64M ram, but it rum more smoothly than most cheap android phones.

But there is a problwem when I use the wm phone, cause it can not get a normal signal. The intensity it get is alwasy weak. So I need a new phone. Though I want to buy a new phone after I started to work originally.

The Nokia X is my first choice, because of Nokia’s fame. But most of markets did not sell it. So I bought a samsung android phone. And it is cheaper than nokia x. Cause I just need an android smart phone which can run smoothly. This samsung phone is enough for me. And I can not afford an expensive phone. So I choose it.

Android, Firefox OS, Ubuntu Phone, Tizen … there are more and more phone os now. But the os I like mostly is wm.

Smooth, Light, though ms would not support it. Writing this article is to remember the OSes, and the smartphones I used.

entry.title: When the block will end?
entry.content:
These days, maybe started a one week ago, I can no access Google. Even replace the hosts, addncr, I still can not access Google.

Must I use google as my search engineer? No, But I need to use digg to read my feed, use utb to watch some cool videos and these websites kind of need google’s service. And there is another bad thing

Goagent can not be used either, A tool need google app engineer. And can be used as a proxy.

What the block in China will end? And why the gov hesitate its people? And why the gov lack of confidence?

Why?

entry.title: Exchange Dream by Jiaqian
entry.content:
The first day in Guangzhou City, there is the Exchange Dream by Jiaqian.

So when I went to Sun Yat-sen University to join in it.

It is my second time to take Guangzhou Train. And when got there, I didn’t know where is north. So I thount and found it by the building’s window(You know although in sourth of China, people still build the big window to sourth).

And with the map, I found the university. But I did not get it, so I asked a passby, he told me the position.

So I went to the classroom where the Exchange Dream started. I foung it before the activity started. And I was hungry, though I had a Niunan Noodle on the road to train stop, the noodle tasted really bad. So I asked a girl where is refectory or dining hall.

She gave me a direction but it is not very clear. Then I went out of the classroom to the refectory.

I did not found it, I walked back and asked a passby. She told me she went there too that I can followed her. And we went the refectory together.

On the road, we talk a few things about the Sun Yat-sen University , her major and why I was here.

Then I arrived in the refectory, I bought a meal ticket, and took some rice and some vegetables to eat(like Popeye the Sailor).

After the dinner, I went back to the calssroom. It is about 7 pm, but Jiaqian was still not arrive.

We waited for about 2/3 hour. She came. And I shared a story about my entering a higher school. And listend more stories from others.

The number of viewers in Sun Yat-sen is less than CUMT. But there are more interesting stories.

And the two girls who was left from me are just hign school students, so young and so cute.

A girl shared her childhood and love story, another girl shared her hairstyle and she how to bet with her deskmate, a boy just standed there until the activity stoped … After it, I went back by train. It is so late, so I took a shower, watche a little TV and just slept for tomorrow’s test.

Oh there is a very cool thing in Sun Yat-Sen University, an old style’s washing room.

entry.title: There is also a Mandela in China
entry.content:
Now, all over the world, there is a lot of activities to commemorate Mandela. Even in China, even In official medium. And these official medium would emphasize to Mandela resist white people. But you know, pure Mandela’s mind is to resist unfair not white people.

Obviously, in China there is a Mandela too. And China’s Mandela’s last name is Liu and Wei and Tan and …

And somenone we call him China’s Mandela is still in the jail. I just want to say do not foget him.

Do not foget the man who resist unfair like Mandela.

Dead man is dead but alive man is alive.

May God Bless China!
